item.title: Some less-known and underused macOS utilities
item.description: launchctl launchd for creating daemons and agents scutil systemsetup otool otool -L /bin/bash ASLs/Logging Disk Utility Resize hdiutil resize -size 10g filename.sparsebundle Creating a sparsebundle (rw) hdiutil create -size <size>g -fs HFS+J -volname <volume_name> <file-name>.sparsebundle hdiutil resize -limits rw.dmg hdiutil create -verbose -type SPARSEBUNDLE -fs HFS+J -encryption AES-128 -stdinpass -nospotlight -volname "HOME" -size 200g HOME.sparsebundle Creating ISO image from a path or CDR hdiutil makehybrid -o image.
